name: Floppy'ng Around
description:
Our Entry for the WOWIE 4.0 hosted by Jonas Tyroller. This game was done in the span of 3 days, so don't expect much. We overscoped a bit, but had really fun making it!

Theme Interpritation: "You program a Robot (Ai), to complete levels".

Notice: The WebGL build could have some bugs that we are not aware of. Recommended to play downloadable version for best experience

Controls:

Controls:Mouse 1- Picking up Floppy disks

Soundtrack can be found here:

Code was done by: Pvp-man

Music and SFX was done by:  Seyaro

Art was made by: L3mmy
